means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 奥尔德 Old的变体

sentence.Network_en: They formed a circle and sang "Auld Lang Syne"
sentence.Network_cn: 他们围成一个圆圈，唱起了《友谊地久天长》。

sentence.Network_en: Should auld acquaintance be forgot and days of auld lang syne?
sentence.Network_cn: 旧日朋友怎能忘记? 友谊地久天长.

sentence.Network_en: The meeting ended up with the singing of Auld Lang Syne.
sentence.Network_cn: 大会以唱“友谊地久天长”结束.

auth_sentence.content: I proposed a walkabout. We were to stroll through Auld Reekie's dusk together.
auth_sentence.res_content: I proposed a walkabout. We were to stroll through Auld Reekie's dusk together.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I proposed a walkabout. We were to stroll through Auld Reekie's dusk together.

auth_sentence.content: My auld Auntie Katie upon me taks pity.
auth_sentence.res_content: My auld Auntie Katie upon me taks pity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My auld Auntie Katie upon me taks pity.

auth_sentence.content: When I again Auld Reikie see, And can forgether, lad, with thee.
auth_sentence.res_content: When I again Auld Reikie see, And can forgether, lad, with thee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When I again Auld Reikie see, And can forgether, lad, with thee.

abbreviation.mean_en: auld lang syne (Scottish=old times fondly remembered)
